llama2_direct_sole-planning_results:
Day 1 (March 10th):

* Depart from Las Vegas in the morning
* Drive to Santa Maria (6 hours 17 minutes, distance of 634 km)
* Check-in at a hotel or motel in the city center (Budget: $150)
* Have lunch at one of the Indian restaurants in town (Budget: $20 per person)
* Visit the Santa Maria Mission and the Old Town area (Budget: $30 per person)
* Dinner at a Mediterranean restaurant (Budget: $40 per person)

Day 2 (March 11th):

* Breakfast at the hotel or motel (Budget: $15 per person)
* Visit the Santa Maria County Park and the Santa Ynez River (Budget: $30 per person)
* Lunch at a local café or bakery (Budget: $20 per person)
* Afternoon visit to the Solvang Vineyards and Winery (Budget: $40 per person)
* Dinner at a seafood restaurant (Budget: $50 per person)

Day 3 (March 12th):

* Check-out from hotel or motel (Budget: $150)
* Drive back to Las Vegas (6 hours 19 minutes, distance of 636 km)
* Stop for lunch at a local restaurant along the way (Budget: $20 per person)
* Arrive in Las Vegas in the evening

Total budget for the trip: $3,700

Recommended restaurants:

* Indian restaurants: Tandoori Nights, India Palace, or Desi Spice
* Mediterranean restaurants: The Meditteranean Grill, Olive Garden, or Greek Gods
* Seafood restaurants: The Fish Counter, The Lobster Shop, or The Crab Catcher

Note: Prices are estimated and can vary depending on the time of year, demand, and other factors. Also, the budget can be adjusted according to your preferences and choices.
